examples.example: 他是一个热心肠的人，总是带着一把雨伞，以便随时帮助那些没带伞的人。

translate.english: He is a warm-hearted person and always carries an umbrella so as to help those who don't have an umbrella at any time.

examples.example: 我送给妹妹一把漂亮的梳子，她非常喜欢。

translate.english: I gave my sister a beautiful comb and she likes it very much.

examples.example: 我在路边捡到了一把钥匙，希望能尽快找到失主。

translate.english: I picked up a key by the roadside and hope to find the owner as soon as possible.
